New Records: Romelu Lukaku had two goals disallowed by VAR during the match.
Key Match Events: Slovakia scored the opening goal in the 7th minute.
Belgium's goals by Romelu Lukaku were overturned by VAR twice.
Ivan Schranz scored the decisive goal for Slovakia.
Pre-Game Insights: Belgium coach Domenico Tedesco emphasized the need for a good performance.
Post-Match Reflections: Belgium coach Domenico Tedesco expressed trust in the match officials.
Slovakia players and staff celebrated their victory with their fans.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was Slovakia's most significant victory at the Euros.
Belgium had not lost under coach Domenico Tedesco in 15 games prior to this match.
Others: The match was part of Group E at Euro 2024.
